attributes.action: Have the elderly ( 70+ ) retested for saftey on our roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having the elderly take a retest on their driving license would take a danger off our roads. The test does not need to be as harsh as the examination for a new driver, the test should only remove those who present a high risk to the public not those who make a few mistakes that would not necessarily cause accidents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
